title: MAXYOYO Bean Bag Chair Bed for Kids, Convertible Bean Bag Folds from Lazy Chair to Floor Mattress Bed, Machine Washable Corded Fabric, Stuffed Floor Sofa Couch for Boys and Girls, Green
description: Switch Freely and Conveniently: The idea behind the bean bag bed was to take the comfort and flexibility of the bean bag chair and expand it into a larger, more accommodating sleeping surface. Simply remove the cover and flip the inner cushion to turn it into a bed. Fold and slide into cover to convert back to a chair
